title: WeWow Halloween 2022 – Day 5: Adventures in Aphantasia: When the Mind is Blind
description:
Welcome back to HalloWeWow! Today, we're listening to Aphantasia: When the Mind is Blind, and testing out a mind mapping challenge! Grownups, share your photos and videos of your Wowzer's tinkerings at tinkercast.com/share. Thanks for joining us this week, catch up on more episodes from WeWow on the new WeWow podcast feed by searching "WeWow" wherever you get your podcasts.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
